name: Donut King FREE - Candy Sugar Jump Adventure
name_original: Donut King FREE - Candy Sugar Jump Adventure
description:
In a faraway land lives the Donut King. The King makes yummy candy sugar donuts in his factory high in the mountains. For fun, the Donut King loves to jump from donut to donut. Can you help him? Earn new achievements and new challenges!

EXCITING FUN AND ITS FREE TO DOWNLOAD!!!

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Donut King FREE’ Now!!!
